domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse America wants to know...

42 M Unemployed 
120 k dead from Covid19
2M Covid19 Carriers
Exploding deficit 
Feds spending Trillions on debt
Negative GDP
Farm exports in decline
Wages in decline
Police brutality 
Racial unrest

What’s next?

#VoteThemAllOut
